locationArray.title: Romeoville
locationArray.info: Nothing special, just my home town

locationArray.title: Braidwood
locationArray.info: Nothing super special here either, this is just where I currently live with my Girlfriend

locationArray.title: Wonder Lake
locationArray.info: I would come to Wonder Lake every year for a family reunion, and I just think its so beautiful.

locationArray.title: Disney world Animal Kingdom
locationArray.info: The first time I went to Animal Kingdom, it was one of the few times that I felt awe. The nature theme is beautiful, and my first visit I walked into a Macaw show, and it was amazing.

locationArray.title: Disney Art of Animation
locationArray.info: I have been to Disney World twice, and have always stayed at the Art of Animation.

locationArray.title: Cinemark at 7 Bridges
locationArray.info: Not a luxuary theatre, but this is my go to theatre. 7 Bridges has one of the best imax screens around, its nearby, and it has the best ticket prices

locationArray.title: The Forge
locationArray.info: A small venue that I have seen plenty of great bands at: Cattle Decapitation, Suffocation, Trivium, Ensiferum, and many others

locationArray.title: Hollywood Casino Ampitheatre
locationArray.info: I have seen so many great concerts here: Ozzy Osbourne, Black Sabbath, Iron Maiden, Slipknot, Lamb of God, to name a few

locationArray.title: Brookfield Zoo
locationArray.info: Having one of the largest zoos in America so close by has been wonderful. I specifically set the latlng to a statue of the Walrus Olga, as it is one of my favorite places at the zoo

locationArray.title: The Shedd Aquarium
locationArray.info: I have always loved visiting the Shedd. I have always loved fish, and the Shedd is a great place to see them.
